meanings.sent1: The apatosauruses roamed the prehistoric land in search of plants to eat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of apatosauruses to learn more about these ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The apatosauruses had a family reunion to celebrate their long history.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the skeletons of apatosauruses stood tall like ancient guardians.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine the apatosauruses moving gracefully through the forests.

meanings.definition: Apatosauruses: a type of dinosaur with a long neck and tail
meanings.sent1: Look at the apatosauruses reaching for leaves high up in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The apatosauruses were herbivores, munching on plants all day long.
meanings.sent3: The apatosauruses had a race to see who could swing their long tails the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The silhouette of the apatosauruses against the setting sun was a majestic sight.
meanings.sent5: Visitors to the park marveled at the lifelike statues of apatosauruses.
